div.p: Resources to teach kids about COVID-19:

li.a: Talking to Children About COVID-19: A Parent Resource

h1.div: For Kids: The Yucky Bug by Julia Cook

iframe.aria-label: YouTube Video, The Yucky Bug by Julia Cook

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

ul.li: Center for Disease Control and Prevention - https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html
North Dakota Department of Public Instruction - https://www.nd.gov/dpi/nddpi-updates-and-guidance-covid-19

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: The Northwood Public School District does not advocate, permit, nor practice discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, or handicap in the educational programs or activities which it operates.

div.p: Northwood Public School - 420 Trojan Road - Northwood, ND 58267 - (701) 587-5221
